  Harindran Oru Nishkalankan
  
  Actors:   Indrajith, Jayasurya, Bhama

  Hareendran (Indrajith) is a software tycoon who runs a very successful listed company. His right-hand man is his childhood friend Gopalakrishnan (Jayasurya), called GK. Hareendran is a nice guy, who is straightforward and trusts people blindly, while GK is a cunning fox in sheep&#039;s clothes. His sole aim in life is to take over Hareendran Business. Hareendran&#039;s mother (Ambika) fixes his marriage to Indu (Bhama) who is in love with Alex (Manikuttan), a self styled left sympathizer. GK uses his girlfriend Pooja (Sherin) to influence Hareendran to make him the director in the Company
GK also uses other people and manipulates them to his advantage which results in Indu running away with Alex a few minutes before Hareendran was wed her. This leaves Hareendran shattered, and he becomes an alcoholic and leaves GK to run the company. But a few days later GK is brutally murdered. Hareendran is accused of killing him, and a media witch-hunt start and he is unable to defend himself even after the police had the person who claimed to be the killer and the court acquits him.
